tool_description: Calculates statistical distributions and metrics for product ratings including mean, median, mode, and percentile distributions.

review_ids.description: List of review IDs containing rating data

group_by_product.description: Whether to calculate distributions separately for each product

error_messages: Empty review data: review_ids array cannot be empty
Missing rating data: One or more reviews lack valid rating information
Insufficient data: Need at least 3 reviews to calculate meaningful distributions
Invalid rating values: All ratings must be numeric values
usage: Provide review IDs with rating data, optionally group by product. Returns comprehensive statistical analysis of rating distributions.

rating_counts.description: Count of reviews for each rating level (1-5 stars)
